description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4vgh9","text":"2xYT is a nutritionally rich liquid microbial growth medium used for propagation of recombinant strains of Escherichia coli and M13 bacteriophage or other filamentous single-stranded DNA bacteriophages.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":107,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"bho85","text":"Prepare enough for the necessary number of experiments to perform in order to prevent batch-to-batch variation between experiments.
